answers.answer: Some people just sweat more than others.  Diabetes is a common cause of excessive sweating.  When a person has no other signs of illness and otherwise appears to be in good health, these are the two most common causes of sweating.  Most of the time such sweating is something one just has to live with.  Sorry.

question: I'm 73 Years old, have for many Years this problem, MD don't know, I sweat out of the blue Sky, Water just runs down my face, damp Arms, uncomfortable when in company. I don't feel ill or anything, just this, it could be middle in winter.Not so much in Summer, I live in Florida ! Its like People go through change of Life. Any Idea wich way to tackle this ??Thank you!Rheinland
title: Cold Sweat
